gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Welcome to the Meeting Notes Generator! This tool transforms your meeting transcripts into structured notes with action items, decisions, and coaching insights.

howToUse.title: How to Use
steps: Enter your meeting title (or leave blank for auto-generation)
Add agenda items, one per line (optional)
Adjust generation controls to fit your needs
Review, export, or interrogate the transcript for more insights

list.title: Smart Extraction
list.description: Automatically identifies key discussion points, decisions, risks, and action items from your transcript

list.title: RAG Status
list.description: Each action item gets a Red/Amber/Green status based on risk, clarity, and deadlines

list.title: Meeting Coach
list.description: Get actionable feedback on meeting effectiveness aligned with Meeting Excellence principles

list.title: Interrogate Transcript
list.description: Ask follow-up questions about your meeting and get AI-powered answers

list.title: Multiple Export Options
list.description: Export to CSV, PDF, or copy to clipboard for easy sharing

items.description: Filter action items to show only one department (plus General). Useful for department-specific standups.
Full Notes shows all sections; Actions Only shows just the Next Steps table.
Executive = high-level with fewer details; Cross-functional = balanced; Department-specific = granular.
Professional = standard business language; Concise = shorter bullets; Client-ready = polished for external sharing.
Adds a Critical Review section that highlights gaps, risks, and ambiguous tasks.
Enables coaching insights with metrics and suggestions for improving future meetings.

tips.title: Pro Tips
list: Include speaker names in the transcript (e.g., 'John: Let's finalize the design')
Use presets for common meeting types to save time
Enable Meeting Coach to improve your team's meeting culture
Use Interrogate Transcript to drill down on specific topics
Turn on Critical Lens for retrospectives or high-stakes meetings
Copy department codes (BL, STR, etc.) for easier action item filtering

items.solution: Switch to 'Concise' tone or 'Actions Only' view
Ensure your transcript includes clear owners and due dates
Check that your agenda items match the topics discussed in the transcript
Try using Copy to Clipboard instead, then paste into your preferred document editor

support.title: Support
support.content: For technical issues or feedback, contact the IPCT Team or your system administrator.
